alert.note: Alert for Southern Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 09 at 4:58AM EST until January 10 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (6.9 to 7.1 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Southern Plymouth County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Buzzards Bay at Mattapoisett MLLW Categories - Minor 8.5 ft, Moderate 10.0 ft, Major 12.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 4.4 ft, Moderate 5.9 ft, Major 7.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/06 AM 4.2/ 4.7 0.1/ 0.6 0.1/ 0.6 1 None 09/06 PM 4.0/ 4.5 -0.2/ 0.3 0.6/ 1.1 1-3 None 10/06 AM 6.8/ 7.3 2.7/ 3.2 2.5/ 3.0 4-6 None 10/06 PM 3.4/ 3.9 -0.8/-0.2 0.1/ 0.6 4-5 None 11/07 AM 4.2/ 4.7 0.2/ 0.7 -0.3/ 0.2 5-6 None 11/08 PM 3.7/ 4.2 -0.5/ 0.0 -0.2/ 0.2 3-4 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
